title: Vesta's blighted longsword

properties.value: Vesta's blighted longsword is an untradeable sword that can be purchased at Justine's stuff for the Last Shopper Standing for 300 Last Man Standing points. It requires 75 Attack to wield.

SMW Subobject for ActiveHigh Alchemy value: 480000Examine: Blighted so it can fight only in the Wilderness on Target worlds.Is members only: trueIs variant of: Vesta's blighted longswordUses infobox: ItemImage: File:Vesta's blighted longsword.pngWeight: 1.814Value: 800000Version anchor: ActiveRelease date: 23 April 2020Item ID: 24617

Vesta's blighted longsword is an untradeable sword that can be purchased at Justine's stuff for the Last Shopper Standing for 300 Last Man Standing points. It requires 75 Attack to wield.

The sword is inactive upon purchase, and must be activated by using 50,000,000 coins on it. Once activated, it becomes equippable, sharing the same stats and special attack as its original variant, but only works against monsters and players in the Wilderness on Target Worlds.

If the owner of this sword dies with it in PvP, the sword is lost on death and dropped as 50,000,000 coins if not one of the player's protected items.

Special attack[edit | edit source]

A player performing Vesta's blighted longsword's special attack.

Vesta's blighted longsword has a special attack, Feint, that consumes 25% of the player's special attack energy and deals between 20% and 120% of the user's max hit.

The accuracy of this special attack is rolled against 25% of the opponent's defence.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
9 July 2020
(update)

Vesta's blighted longsword can now be used to attack a combat dummy within a player's Combat room.

'''Vesta's blighted longsword''' is an untradeable sword that can be purchased at [[Justine's stuff for the Last Shopper Standing]] for 300 [[Last Man Standing]] points. It requires 75 [[Attack]] to wield.

The sword is inactive upon purchase, and must be activated by using {{NoCoins|50000000}} coins on it. Once activated, it becomes equippable, sharing the same stats and [[special attack]] as its [[Vesta's longsword|original variant]], but only works against monsters and players in the [[Wilderness]] on [[Target World]]s.

If the owner of this sword dies with it in PvP, the sword is lost on death and dropped as {{NoCoins|50000000}} coins if not one of the player's protected items.

==Special attack==
[[File:Feint.gif|thumb|260px|A player performing Vesta's blighted longsword's special attack.]]
Vesta's blighted longsword has a [[special attack]], ''Feint'', that consumes 25% of the player's [[special attack energy]] and deals between 20% and 120% of the user's max hit.

The accuracy of this special attack is rolled against 25% of the opponent's [[defence]].
